name: map-deckgl-geo
title: deck.gl Geo Layers
description: Geospatial layers: Trips, MVT, Tile, Tile3D, Terrain, H3, GreatCircle, and more.

files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglTrips } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { TripsLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';

  export interface MapLayerTripsProps extends Partial<TripsLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerTripsProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglTrips v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglTrips>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglMVT } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { MVTLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';
  import type { PickingInfo } from '@deck.gl/core';

  export interface MapLayerMVTProps extends Partial<MVTLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: string | string[];
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerMVTProps>();

  const emit = defineEmits<{
    click: [info: PickingInfo];
    hover: [info: PickingInfo];
  }>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglMVT
    v-bind="props"
    @click="(info) => emit('click', info)"
    @hover="(info) => emit('hover', info)"
  ></VLayerDeckglMVT>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglTile } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { TileLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';

  export interface MapLayerTileProps extends Partial<TileLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: string | string[];
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerTileProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglTile v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglTile>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglTile3D } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { Tile3DLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';

  export interface MapLayerTile3DProps extends Partial<Tile3DLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerTile3DProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglTile3D v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglTile3D>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglTerrain } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { TerrainLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';

  export interface MapLayerTerrainProps extends Partial<TerrainLayerProps> {
    id: string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerTerrainProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglTerrain v-bind="props"></VLayerDeckglTerrain>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglH3Hexagon } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { H3HexagonLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';
  import type { PickingInfo } from '@deck.gl/core';

  export interface MapLayerH3HexagonProps extends Partial<H3HexagonLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerH3HexagonProps>();

  const emit = defineEmits<{
    click: [info: PickingInfo];
    hover: [info: PickingInfo];
  }>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglH3Hexagon
    v-bind="props"
    @click="(info) => emit('click', info)"
    @hover="(info) => emit('hover', info)"
  ></VLayerDeckglH3Hexagon>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { VLayerDeckglGreatCircle } from '@geoql/v-maplibre';
  import type { GreatCircleLayerProps } from '@deck.gl/geo-layers';
  import type { PickingInfo } from '@deck.gl/core';

  export interface MapLayerGreatCircleProps extends Partial<GreatCircleLayerProps> {
    id: string;
    data: unknown[] | string;
  }

  const props = defineProps<MapLayerGreatCircleProps>();

  const emit = defineEmits<{
    click: [info: PickingInfo];
    hover: [info: PickingInfo];
  }>();
</script>

<template>
  <VLayerDeckglGreatCircle
    v-bind="props"
    @click="(info) => emit('click', info)"
    @hover="(info) => emit('hover', info)"
  ></VLayerDeckglGreatCircle>
</template>
